entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 14.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
